comments:
I'm using eclipse-SDK-N20060320-0010-win32

Help/Search to open the help view 
Search for "Standalone SWT"

The first result is the cheat sheet "Standalone SWT Application", so far so good 

Click on the hyperlink

Expected result: The cheat sheet opens.
Actual result: The cheat sheet view is opened but just shows a gray background. There is a null pointer exception in the log.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.readFile(CheatSheetViewer.java:919)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.initCheatSheetView(CheatSheetViewer.java:805)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.setContent(CheatSheetViewer.java:1053)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.setInput(CheatSheetViewer.java:1101)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.setInput(CheatSheetViewer.java:1076)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetView.setInput(CheatSheetView.java:224)
	at org.eclipse.ui.cheatsheets.OpenCheatSheetAction.run(OpenCheatSheetAction.java:92)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.CheatsheetSearchParticipant.open(CheatsheetSearchParticipant.java:89)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.federated.LocalHelp.open(LocalHelp.java:98)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.ReusableHelpPart.showURL(ReusableHelpPart.java:1159)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.ReusableHelpPart$12.run(ReusableHelpPart.java:1138)
	at org.eclipse.swt.custom.BusyIndicator.showWhile(BusyIndicator.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.ReusableHelpPart.showURL(ReusableHelpPart.java:1136)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.SearchResultsPart.doOpenLink(SearchResultsPart.java:264)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.EngineResultSection$2.linkActivated(EngineResultSection.java:163)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.FormText.activateLink(FormText.java:1515)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.FormText.handleMouseClick(FormText.java:1330)

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.readFile(CheatSheetViewer.java:919)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.initCheatSheetView(CheatSheetViewer.java:805)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.setContent(CheatSheetViewer.java:1053)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.setInput(CheatSheetViewer.java:1101)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetViewer.setInput(CheatSheetViewer.java:1076)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.views.CheatSheetView.setInput(CheatSheetView.java:224)
	at org.eclipse.ui.cheatsheets.OpenCheatSheetAction.run(OpenCheatSheetAction.java:92)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.CheatsheetSearchParticipant.open(CheatsheetSearchParticipant.java:89)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.federated.LocalHelp.open(LocalHelp.java:98)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.ReusableHelpPart.showURL(ReusableHelpPart.java:1159)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.ReusableHelpPart$12.run(ReusableHelpPart.java:1138)
	at org.eclipse.swt.custom.BusyIndicator.showWhile(BusyIndicator.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.ReusableHelpPart.showURL(ReusableHelpPart.java:1136)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.SearchResultsPart.doOpenLink(SearchResultsPart.java:264)
	at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.views.EngineResultSection$2.linkActivated(EngineResultSection.java:163)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.FormText.activateLink(FormText.java:1515)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.FormText.handleMouseClick(FormText.java:1330)
The problem is that the id used to open the cheatsheet is "org.eclipse.ui.cheatsheets/org.eclipse.jdt.helloworld.swt", it should be "org.eclipse.jdt.helloworld.swt"

Hmmmm... The first segment is the id of the search participant. It is required to locate the participant that should open the hit. I need to find out why the fully qualified id is passed to the participant.
A patch which includes a fix for this bug has been attached to Bug 128263.
Patch from bug 128263 has been applied.
